experiences.title: Graphic Designer & Photographer
experiences.description: Lead graphic designer creating visual content for all SJSU Athletics teams including schedules, gameday graphics, social media content, and photography coverage.
responsibilities: Design weekly gameday graphics and promotional materials for 17+ sports teams
Create schedule posters and tournament graphics for fall, spring, and summer seasons
Photograph live sporting events and provide action photography for marketing use
Develop social media content strategy and templates for Instagram and Twitter
Collaborate with coaching staff and marketing team on brand consistency
Manage rapid turnaround design requests for time-sensitive content
achievements: Increased social media engagement by 40% through improved graphic design
Developed standardized design templates used across all sports programs
Covered 50+ live sporting events with professional photography

experiences.title: Graphic Designer
experiences.description: Created comprehensive visual content for Cal Football including recruiting materials, gameday campaigns, and statistical graphics.
responsibilities: Design weekly game posters and matchup preview graphics
Create recruiting materials for official visits and commitment announcements
Develop statistical graphics and season recap visualizations
Produce NFL Draft celebration graphics for former Cal players
Design off-season promotional content and spring practice materials
achievements: Designed graphics for 12 regular season games plus bowl game
Created comprehensive recruiting package used for top-tier prospects
Developed signature visual style adopted across Cal Football social media

experiences.title: Design Intern
experiences.description: Student internship focused on learning sports design fundamentals and supporting the football program's visual content needs.
responsibilities: Assisted with gameday content creation and social media graphics
Supported award recognition graphics and milestone celebrations
Learned industry-standard design software and sports marketing principles
Collaborated with senior designers on major campaign projects
achievements: Completed comprehensive sports design training program
Contributed to 6+ gameday campaigns during internship period
Received commendation for creativity and attention to detail
